data.eml:eml: The occurrence of Scolymia cubensis in Brazil: revising the problem of the Caribbean solitary mussids

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neves, Elizabeth, Johnsson, Rodrigo, Sampaio, Claudio, Pichon, Michel (2006): The occurrence of Scolymia cubensis in Brazil: revising the problem of the Caribbean solitary mussids. Zootaxa 1366: 45-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174809
